import React from 'react'; import './PortfolioSummary.css'; const formatCurrency = (value) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2 }).format(value); }; const formatPercentage = (value) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'percent', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, signDisplay: 'always' }).format(value / 100); }; const FearGreedIndex = ({ value }) => { let sentiment; if (value <= 25) sentiment = 'Extreme Fear'; else if (value <= 45) sentiment = 'Fear'; else if (value <= 55) sentiment = 'Neutral'; else if (value <= 75) sentiment = 'Greed'; else sentiment = 'Extreme Greed'; return (

Fear & Greed Index

{sentiment}
Extreme Fear Neutral Extreme Greed

The Fear & Greed Index measures market sentiment from 0 (extreme fear) to 100 (extreme greed), helping identify potential buying or selling opportunities.

); }; const PortfolioSummary = ({ portfolio }) => { const { positions = [] } = portfolio; // Calculate total portfolio value const totalValue = positions.reduce((sum, position) => sum + (position.shares * position.currentPrice), 0); // Calculate total gain/loss const totalCost = positions.reduce((sum, position) => sum + (position.shares * position.averagePrice), 0); const totalGainLoss = totalValue - totalCost; const totalGainLossPercentage = (totalGainLoss / totalCost) * 100; // Calculate today's change const todaysChange = positions.reduce((sum, position) => { const previousClose = position.currentPrice / (1 + (position.dailyChange / 100)); return sum + (position.shares * (position.currentPrice - previousClose)); }, 0); return (

); }; export default PortfolioSummary;
